name: Gift SMS
tag_list: gift-vouchers, gift-cards, mobile-gift-vouchers, gift-card-solutions, gift-voucher-solutions, business-solutions, mobile-vouchers
overview:
Gift SMS is a mobile gift voucher company that gives retailers, merchants & consumers a platform for sending,redeeming and integrating a mobile gifting solution into businesses.

Gift SMS - Mobile Gift Vouchers are sent via SMS to mobile phones which are redeemable inside participating retail outlets. Gift SMS have a full turn key and automated gifting solution which fits most retail scenarios from the smaller to larger businesses.

Gift SMS are leading gift voucher technology to enhance the consumer experience the mobile way and also give the retailer a new ways to increase revenue inside their stores using the latest in technology.
